tests.name: Daily Linac Output Constancy
tests.description: Morning verification of the constancy of the linac's radiation output for all photon energies.
tests.method:
1. Set up the daily QA phantom on the treatment couch
2. Align phantom to lasers
3. Deliver 100 MU for each photon energy
4. Record measured values
5. Compare to baseline values
6. Verify results are within tolerance

tests.name: Daily Laser Alignment Check
tests.description: Verification of the treatment room laser alignment with isocenter.
tests.method:
1. Place the daily QA phantom on the treatment couch
2. Align the phantom crosshairs with room lasers
3. Verify alignment of phantom markers with lasers
4. Document any deviations observed

tests.name: Daily Door Interlock Check
tests.description: Verification that the treatment room door interlock prevents beam delivery when triggered.
tests.tolerances: Door interlock must terminate beam when triggered
tests.method:
1. Prepare for beam delivery
2. Open the treatment room door
3. Attempt to deliver beam
4. Verify beam cannot be turned on when door is open

tests.name: Weekly Output Constancy (All Energies)
tests.description: Comprehensive verification of output constancy for all photon and electron energies.
tests.tolerances: ±2% from baseline for photons, ±3% for electrons
tests.method:
1. Set up the weekly QA phantom/ion chamber
2. Deliver 100 MU for each photon and electron energy
3. Record measured values for all energies
4. Compare to baseline values
5. Verify results are within tolerance

tests.name: Weekly Beam Flatness and Symmetry
tests.description: Verification of beam flatness and symmetry for all energies using 2D array.
tests.method:
1. Set up 2D detector array on treatment couch
2. Level the array and align to isocenter
3. Deliver 100 MU for each energy with 10×10 field
4. Analyze flatness and symmetry for each beam
5. Compare to baseline values

tests.name: Monthly Output Calibration Check
tests.description: Detailed verification of absolute dose calibration for all energies.
tests.method:
1. Set up water-equivalent phantom at reference depth
2. Position ion chamber at reference conditions
3. Deliver 100 MU for each energy
4. Apply appropriate correction factors
5. Calculate dose and compare to expected values

tests.name: MLC Position Accuracy
tests.description: Verification of MLC leaf positioning accuracy using picket fence test.
tests.method:
1. Set up EPID or detector array
2. Deliver picket fence test pattern
3. Analyze the image for MLC positioning accuracy
4. Compare positions to expected values
5. Document any deviations observed

tests.name: Collimator/Jaw Position Accuracy
tests.description: Verification of the accuracy of jaw positions for various field sizes.
tests.method:
1. Set up EPID or detector at 100 cm SSD
2. Deliver fields of various sizes (5×5, 10×10, 20×20 cm²)
3. Measure field sizes in both axes
4. Compare to expected field sizes
5. Document any deviations

tests.name: Monthly Comprehensive Laser Alignment
tests.description: Comprehensive check of all room lasers for alignment with mechanical isocenter.
tests.method:
1. Mount pointer tool at isocenter using mechanical front pointer
2. Check alignment of all room lasers with pointer
3. Verify sagittal, axial, and coronal laser alignment
4. Document any deviations

tests.name: Light/Radiation Field Coincidence
tests.description: Verification that the light field accurately represents the radiation field.
tests.method:
1. Set up film or light/rad coincidence phantom at isocenter
2. Mark the light field edges on film/device
3. Deliver radiation exposure
4. Measure the difference between light and radiation field
5. Document any discrepancies
equipment: Film, markers and processing equipment or specialized light/rad phantom

tests.name: Treatment Couch QA
tests.description: Verification of treatment couch positioning accuracy in all directions.
tests.method:
1. Set up isocenter alignment tool on couch
2. Zero the couch position
3. Move couch in known increments (vertical, lateral, longitudinal)
4. Verify digital readouts match actual movement
5. Test rotational accuracy
6. Document any discrepancies

tests.name: Annual TG-51 Calibration
tests.description: Full absolute dose calibration following TG-51 protocol.
tests.method:
1. Set up water phantom
2. Position ion chamber at reference depth
3. Take measurements for all energies
4. Apply all correction factors
5. Calculate absolute dose calibration
6. Adjust output if necessary
7. Document all measurements and calculations

tests.name: Annual Mechanical QA
tests.description: Comprehensive check of all mechanical aspects of the linear accelerator.
tests.method:
1. Verify mechanical, radiation, and imaging isocenter coincidence
2. Check gantry, collimator, and couch rotation accuracy
3. Verify all mechanical and digital indicators
4. Check safety interlocks
5. Document all test results

tests.name: CT Simulator Daily Warm-up
tests.description: Morning warm-up and system check of the CT simulator.
tests.method:
1. Run manufacturer-recommended warm-up procedure
2. Check for error messages
3. Verify system readiness
4. Document completion
equipment: CT QA phantom (if required by manufacturer)

tests.name: CT Simulator Laser Check
tests.description: Verification of the alignment of CT positioning lasers.
tests.method:
1. Position the CT QA phantom on the CT couch
2. Align phantom to room lasers
3. Verify coincidence of laser markings with phantom markers
4. Document any deviations
equipment: CT QA phantom with laser alignment markers

tests.name: CT Number Constancy
tests.description: Verification of the constancy of CT numbers for various materials.
tests.tolerances: ±5 HU for water, ±10 HU for other materials
tests.method:
1. Scan the CT QA phantom with standard protocol
2. Measure CT numbers in various material inserts
3. Compare to baseline values
4. Document any deviations
equipment: CT QA phantom with various density inserts

tests.name: CT Image Quality Check
tests.description: Evaluation of CT image quality parameters including noise, uniformity, and resolution.
tests.method:
1. Scan the CT QA phantom with standard protocol
2. Measure image noise in uniform region
3. Check uniformity across field
4. Evaluate high-contrast resolution
5. Compare to baseline values
equipment: CT QA phantom with uniformity and resolution sections

tests.name: CT Simulator Comprehensive Laser QA
tests.description: Detailed verification of the alignment and accuracy of all CT positioning lasers.
tests.method:
1. Place the laser alignment phantom on the CT couch
2. Align to room lasers
3. Scan the phantom
4. Verify that the CT-indicated position matches the laser-indicated position
5. Check all lasers (axial, sagittal, coronal)
6. Document any deviations

tests.name: CT Table Position Accuracy
tests.description: Verification of the accuracy of the CT table positioning and movement.
tests.method:
1. Place markers at known positions on the CT table
2. Move the table in defined increments
3. Verify that the actual movement matches the digital readout
4. Test in different load conditions
5. Document any discrepancies

tests.name: TPS Basic Calculation Verification
tests.description: Verification of the accuracy of basic dose calculations in the TPS.
tests.method:
1. Calculate dose for standard test cases (e.g., 10×10 field at reference depth)
2. Compare results to commissioned beam data or independent calculation
3. Document any discrepancies
equipment: Secondary MU calculation software or spreadsheet

tests.name: TPS Heterogeneity Correction Check
tests.description: Verification of the accuracy of heterogeneity corrections in the TPS.
tests.method:
1. Create test plans on phantom with known heterogeneities
2. Calculate dose using the TPS
3. Compare to measured data or published benchmarks
4. Document any discrepancies

tests.name: TPS IMRT/VMAT Algorithm Verification
tests.description: Verification of the accuracy of IMRT/VMAT optimization and dose calculation.
tests.method:
1. Create standard IMRT/VMAT test plans
2. Calculate dose using the TPS
3. Compare to standard datasets or independent calculations
4. Verify MLC modeling accuracy
5. Document any discrepancies

tests.name: Annual TPS Comprehensive Review
tests.description: Comprehensive review of all aspects of the treatment planning system.
tests.method:
1. Verify all beam data against commissioning values
2. Test all calculation algorithms with standard datasets
3. Check system configuration and beam modeling parameters
4. Verify correct software version and updates
5. Document all tests and results

tests.name: Patient-Specific IMRT/VMAT QA
tests.description: Verification of the accuracy of patient-specific IMRT or VMAT treatment plans.
tests.tolerances: ≥90% pass rate with 3%/3mm gamma criteria or per institutional protocol
tests.method:
1. Export patient treatment plan to QA phantom
2. Deliver the plan to the phantom with detector array
3. Measure dose distribution
4. Compare measured to calculated dose using gamma analysis
5. Document results and approval

tests.name: Patient-Specific SBRT QA
tests.description: Verification of the accuracy of patient-specific SBRT treatment plans with stricter criteria.
tests.tolerances: ≥95% pass rate with 2%/2mm gamma criteria or per institutional protocol
tests.method:
1. Export SBRT treatment plan to QA phantom
2. Deliver the plan to the phantom with high-resolution detector
3. Measure dose distribution
4. Compare measured to calculated dose using gamma analysis
5. Verify absolute dose at key points
6. Document results and approval

tests.name: Physics Weekly Chart Check
tests.description: Physics review of active patient treatment records and delivery.
tests.method:
1. Review treatment parameters for each active patient
2. Verify that delivered parameters match planned parameters
3. Check cumulative dose and fractionation
4. Verify imaging protocols are followed
5. Check for authorization of any overrides
6. Document review completion

tests.name: Initial Physics Chart Check
tests.description: Comprehensive physics review before the start of treatment.
tests.method:
1. Review treatment plan and calculations
2. Verify correct transfer to Record & Verify system
3. Check plan approval status
4. Verify correct prescription
5. Check setup instructions and imaging protocols
6. Verify required QA has been completed
7. Document approval

tests.name: Ion Chamber Calibration Verification
tests.description: Verification of ion chamber calibration factor against standard or intercomparison.
tests.method:
1. Set up reference conditions in water or solid water phantom
2. Measure charge under reference conditions
3. Apply all correction factors
4. Compare calculated dose to expected dose
5. Document results

tests.name: Diode Detector Calibration
tests.description: Calibration of diode detectors used for patient dosimetry.
tests.method:
1. Set up reference ion chamber in phantom
2. Measure dose under reference conditions
3. Replace ion chamber with diode detector
4. Determine calibration factor for the diode
5. Document calibration factors

tests.name: Detector Array Calibration
tests.description: Calibration of 2D/3D detector arrays used for IMRT/VMAT QA.
tests.method:
1. Follow manufacturer's calibration procedure
2. Deliver uniform dose to entire array
3. Generate correction factors for each detector
4. Verify calibration with test fields
5. Document calibration date and results

tests.name: Daily CBCT/kV Imaging QA
tests.description: Daily quality check of CBCT and kV imaging systems.
tests.tolerances: All functions operational, image quality acceptable
tests.method:
1. Acquire test images using QA phantom
2. Verify image quality is acceptable
3. Check functionality of all modes
4. Document completion

tests.name: Monthly IGRT System QA
tests.description: Comprehensive check of all image guidance systems.
tests.tolerances: Table shift accuracy: ±1 mm, Image quality per baseline
tests.method:
1. Image IGRT QA phantom
2. Analyze image quality metrics
3. Test auto-registration accuracy
4. Verify couch shift accuracy
5. Check imaging vs. treatment isocenter coincidence
6. Document all results

tests.name: Emergency Procedures Verification
tests.description: Verification of staff knowledge and functionality of emergency systems.
tests.tolerances: All staff must demonstrate understanding, all systems functional
tests.method:
1. Review emergency procedures with staff
2. Test emergency off buttons
3. Verify emergency door opening
4. Practice emergency response
5. Document successful completion

tests.name: Radiation Survey
tests.description: Comprehensive survey of radiation levels around treatment areas.
tests.method:
1. Deliver high-MU beams at various gantry angles
2. Measure radiation levels at vault boundaries
3. Measure scattered radiation in adjacent areas
4. Document all measurements
5. Compare to regulatory limits

tests.name: HDR Source Calibration
tests.description: Verification of HDR source strength after source exchange.
tests.method:
1. Measure source in well chamber
2. Calculate source strength
3. Compare to decay-corrected certificate value
4. Document results and update treatment system

tests.name: HDR Daily QA
tests.description: Daily check of HDR unit safety systems and basic functionality.
tests.tolerances: All safety systems functional, position accuracy ±1 mm
tests.method:
1. Check door interlocks
2. Check emergency response equipment
3. Perform source position check
4. Test treatment interrupt
5. Document all results
